title: DISCOVERING MAJORS AND CAREERS
description:
(1/12 unit)
This course is open to all students who are undecided about or are thinking about changing their academic major. Students will conduct a self assessment utilizing career assessment tools, research majors of interest and career paths, attend academic department presentations/major panels, participate in informational interviews, job shadowing and/or company tours.  Students will meet individually with Peer Advisors and/or a CDC staff member at least three times throughout the course.
